## Properties

|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [maxDataPoints?](./bullmq.metricsoptions.maxdatapoints.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Enable gathering metrics for finished jobs. Output refers to all finished jobs, completed or failed. |
